course.subject: OCES
course.name: Internship
course.description: This course aims to provide students with hands-on experience in environmental and ocean science fields. Students will undertake training and duties under the internship supervisors. Graded P or F. Maybe graded PP. Cantonese may be used in off-campus trainings and internships, in some situations.
